concept.title: Path metrics
concept.shortdesc: The report view types (Separated, Time-lapsed, and Merged) show the results of key metrics for each path.

conbody.p: The top values for each metric are highlighted.

row.entry: Percentage and total number of customers who traveled the path.
Average amount of revenue that was generated by customers who traveled the path.
Average length of time for a customer to travel the path from beginning to end.
Number of unique customers who traveled the path.
